resources.string: \nYou can tap the Save As icon to save a copy of your current note under a different name.
\nIn your notes list, press and hold a note to show options.
\nPress and hold your home screen to access the widget menu. Choose "Blink" or "Normal". Tap the new widget to choose which note to display.
\nTap a note pinned on your home screen. Tap the widget settings icon to adjust blink rate and color.
\nOn your home screen, press and hold your pinned note. Release to enable widget border control. Drag a border to stretch, enlarge, or shrink the widget.
